title: The Real Effect of Vaccines
description:
The great enemy of the truth is very often not the lieâ€”
deliberate, contrived and dishonest, but the myth, persistent,
persuasive, and unrealistic. Belief in myths allows the
comfort of opinion without the discomfort of thought.

â€“ John Fitzgerald Kennedy (1917â€“1963)

Just take a walk or drive around this time of year and you canâ€™t help noticing signs for the flu vaccine. Theyâ€™re pretty
much everywhere, lining entire parking lots and walkways into markets. They encourage everyone to get the shot â€“

telling you to â€œwalk in anytimeâ€ and of course accepting insurance. Some even offer incentives to get the vaccine
such as a giving a 20% off shopping pass with every flu shot. At workplaces across the country notices are sent out
offering shots at flu clinics. Itâ€™s a full court press promoting the vaccine everywhere for everyone.

I called my local pharmacy to find out who could get the shot. They told me I didnâ€™t even need a doctorâ€™s note. I asked
if a pregnant woman could get the shot and they said that it wasnâ€™t contraindicated, but some people ask for
preservative free shots. I asked if I was feeling under the weather if I could still get the shot and the answer was â€œsure
no problem.â€

So itâ€™s easy. No doctorâ€™s note. All you need is insurance and if you donâ€™t have it just $31.99 per shot â€“ at least thatâ€™s
the price at my local pharmacy. It didnâ€™t even matter if you were sick youâ€™re ready for your shot. It couldnâ€™t be any
simpler.

But a couple of things were missing â€“ science and information. Of course there is no debate when questioning
vaccination in general and so it goes with the flu vaccine. Simply blindly accept, roll up your sleeve and get the
injection that will supposedly protect you from getting sick. It has to be true doesnâ€™t it? The government and medical
organizations have all signed on and each year there is more and more push for everyone young and old to get
vaccinated. But letâ€™s do something youâ€™re never supposed to do â€“ ask questions and look for answers.

One of the most obvious questions is â€œdid the flu vaccine reduce deaths?â€


HERE ALL THE TRUTH ABOUT THE SO CALLED "VACCINES" GET FILES TO LEARN MORE
